title: Easter Brunch
description:
This Easter Sunday, hop into a festive day at The Padre full of brunch and photos with the Easter Bunny!

BRUNCH
Free Flowing Champagne Brunch 10am - 4pm Accompanied by Seafood, Carving & Dessert Stations $39/adult $15/children
VIEW THE MENU >>

PHOTOS WITH THE EASTER BUNNY
12-2pm Included with Children's Buffet
